segments.text: I ’ Ve decided to grow my own garden !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? You don ’ t know the first thing about gardening !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On the contrary , I have been reading a lot of books about the subject .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah ? Tell me then , smarty pants , how will you go about setting up your garden ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , first I need to buy some things , such as fertilizer , seeds and tools .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , the basics . A rake , shovel , spade and a hoe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Well it seems like you have all your bases covered . What ’ s next ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll till the soil and then sow the seeds . I ’ ll then add some fertilizer and voila ! Gardening all done !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , good luck with your garden , especially considering we are in the dry season and it won ’ t rain for the next three months !
segments.speaker: S2
